title: r/Idontworkherelady "I'm A Customer, YOU MORON!"
description:
r/Idontworkherelady In today's episode, OP is an older woman who visits a fitness center because she needs her exercise machine repaired. The manager who works there just assumes that OP is there for a job interview, and then immediately starts acting condescending to her by saying that old people shouldn't work at a gym. Not only is that insanely rude, it's also illegal! OP doesn't stand for and gets this entitled jerk fired!

🔔 Subscribe: https://bit.ly/2E3A8i6
